name: Cinemabition (20T3)
description:
Cinemabition is a playable exhibition featuring many of the projects created by Games students during Trimester 3 2020 at SAE's Brisbane Campus.

Cinemabition Team (20T2)

  • Jakob Houghton
  • Liam Sigrell
  • Reece Jones
  • Harrison Sinnamon
  • Jack Yeomans

Facilitators

  • Erika Verkaaik
  • Greg Quincey

Exhibition base + additional development

  • Iain McManus

Featured Projects

  • GAD180 - Magus Knight
  • Studio 1 - Falling Sky Cathedral
  • Studio 1 - Hokus Packus 
  • Studio 1 - Match Mania: Valentines Dash
  • Studio 1 - Painting With Rain 
  • Studio 1 - The Emperor's Race 
  • Studio 1 - The Other Side 
  • Studio 1 - Vasalanche 
  • Studio 2 - Almost Recognizable 
  • Studio 2 - First Days
  • Studio 2 - Hey, I'm here
  • Studio 2 - Planet Ours
  • Studio 2 - Space Fish Brisbane Odyssey
  • Studio 2 - Stay Quiet
  • Studio 2 - Your Roots 
  • Studio 3 - A.R.T.D.
  • CIU212 - The Pigeon Theory
  • CIU212 - To The Theatre
  • CIU330 - Fear & Fury 
  • CIU330 - Fizik
  • CIU330 - Just Sticks and Balls
  • CIU330 - Own Two Hands, Own Two Feet 
  • CIU330 - Mooshy
  • CIU330 - Terra Aeger
